interface.name: com.redhat.ifcfgrh1
interface.tp:docstring: Utility methods for handling NM integration with standard Red Hat ifcfg files.

method.name: GetIfcfgDetails
method.tp:docstring: Given an ifcfg file, return various internal information about it.

arg.name: ifcfg
arg.tp:docstring: The full path to an ifcfg file.

arg.name: uuid
arg.tp:docstring: The UUID of the NM connection backed by this ifcfg file. If the ifcfg file does not contain a UUID tag, this UUID is generated by NM, otherwise the UUID from the ifcfg file is used.

arg.name: path
arg.tp:docstring: The object path of the NM connected backed by this ifcfg file.
